sys_ux_client_script.name: View request redirection

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_d36f6fa6f0f741106849a88352abb313
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">976f6fa6c7f741109c815e3547749714</macroponent><name>View request redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId
    } = api.context.props;

    const route = "record_request";

    if (table != "sc_request") {
        table = table == "incident" ? "incident" : "task";
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table : "sc_req_item",
                sysId : api.data.request_item_data_broker_1.output.sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 17:29:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>d36f6fa6f0f741106849a88352abb313</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>View request redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PFM" source="x_708650_pfm">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PFM">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d36f6fa6f0f741106849a88352abb313</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 17:29:34</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
